title: Global Finance Names Citi Best Global Custodian Bank in Latin America for the Second Year in a Row
summary: Miami, Fla. - Citi was awarded Best Global Custodian Bank in Latin America for the second year in a row by Global Finance Magazine in the World's Best Securities Services Providers 2017 awards. In addition, the bank won the new Best Securities Lender in Latin America category as well as Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Chile (Banco de Chile).
tag-1: Global Finance Names Citi Best Global Custodian Bank in Latin America for the Second Year in a Row
tag-2: Miami, Fla. – Citi was awarded Best Global Custodian Bank in Latin America for the second year in a row by Global Finance Magazine in the World's Best Securities Services Providers 2017 awards. In addition, the bank won the new Best Securities Lender in Latin America category as well as Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Chile (Banco de Chile).
tag-3: Global Finance's editorial board, making use of market research, input from expert sources and entry information from banks, selected the winners from the institutions that reliably provide the best services in local markets and regions. The criteria included customer relations, quality of service, competitive pricing, smooth handling of exception items, technology platforms, postsettlement operations, business continuity plans and knowledge of local regulations and practices.
tag-4: "It is an honor to receive these awards which recognize the quality of our service, as well as the effort and dedication of each member of the team," said Ricardo Hesse, Citi Securities Services Head for Latin America. "For us, it is a priority to continue to provide our customers with the highest standards of quality service in all our products including our custody services."
tag-5: Citi has been a leading provider of custody services in the region for more than two decades. Through offices in 21 countries, Citi provides a full suite of administration and custody services to financial institutions and corporate clients across the region.

tag-9: About Cornell Tech Cornell Tech brings together faculty, business leaders, tech entrepreneurs, and students in a catalytic environment to reinvent the way we live in the digital age. Cornell Tech's temporary campus has been up and running at Google's Chelsea building since 2013, with a growing world-class faculty, and more than 200 masters and Ph.D. students who collaborate extensively with tech-oriented companies and organizations and pursue their own start-ups. Construction is underway on Cornell Tech's campus on Roosevelt Island, with a first phase due to open in September 2017. When fully completed, the campus will include 2 million square feet of state-of-the-art buildings, over 2 acres of open space, and will be home to more than 2,000 graduate students and hundreds of faculty and staff.
